title: Elegant Diamond Kadas - Mesmerizing Brilliance in Every Glimmer
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) Diamonds. Finished with a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for enhanced luster and longevity.
features: These delicate kadas feature a modern geometric design with a central diamond motif within the apex of triangle shapes. The diamonds are intricately set, maximizing their brilliance and sparkle. The slim profile and refined design allow for comfortable, everyday wear. The lock mechanism is discreetly integrated for a seamless look.
colors: Warm Yellow Gold with dazzling White Cubic Zirconia Diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated gift. Adds a touch of elegance to any outfit. Ideal for Diwali
or a special occasion where you want to shine.
description: These Diamond Kadas offer a blend of modern design and timeless elegance. The high-quality materials and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's richness, providing a luxurious feel. They are versatile enough to be worn alone or stacked with other bangles. An affordable luxury.
